author: smuzaffar
body:
Replace last remaining LinkDef.h to XML selection file. 
We did this migration a long time ago (see #2411, #1881, #11661 ). 

SimTransport/TotemRPProtonTransportParametrization was added by https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25599 after the migration. I would suggest that once this PR is merged then we disable `LinkDef.h` build rule.
title: Replace last LinkDef.h file with XML selection file
